meta.description: Minimize the cost of a diet consisting of protein bars and noodles while meeting nutritional requirements.

sets.name: FOODS
sets.description: Types of food available for the diet.

params.name: cost
params.description: Cost per serving of each food.

params.name: calories
params.description: Calories per serving of each food.

params.name: protein
params.description: Protein grams per serving of each food.

vars.name: servings
vars.description: Number of servings of each food.

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.description: Minimize the total cost of the diet.

constraints.name: calories_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure at least 2000 calories per day.

constraints.name: protein_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure at least 16 grams of protein per day.
